TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WindowsImpersonationContext extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示模拟操作之前的 Windows 用户。

span.span: Represents the Windows user prior to an impersonation operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户模拟另一个用户后，此类会恢复用户的标识。This class reverts a user's identity after the user impersonates another user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try` / `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用对象实现 IDisposable"一节接口主题。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何模拟用户，然后恢复为原始标识。The following example demonstrates how to impersonate a user and then revert to the original identity. [!code-cpp[WindowsIdentity Impersonation#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/WindowsIdentity Impersonation/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WindowsIdentity Impersonation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/WindowsIdentity Impersonation/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WindowsIdentity Impersonation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/WindowsIdentity Impersonation/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.para: Microsoft Windows 98 和 Windows Millennium Edition 平台没有用户或用户令牌，因为模拟不会在这些平台上的发生。
Because Microsoft Windows 98 and Windows Millennium Edition platforms do not have users or user tokens, impersonation cannot take place on those platforms.

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用这样垃圾回收器才能收回内存的占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). **注意：** 始终为调用发布到最后一个引用之前。**Note:** Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，它所使用的资源之前，不会释放垃圾回收器调用对象的**Finalize**方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's **Finalize** method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放任何托管对象所持有的所有资源，此的引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次调用由其他对象。重写时小心不要引用已经释放的早期调用中的对象。详细了解如何实现，请参阅 [实现 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。有关详细信息和，请参阅 [清理了非托管 Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed
.method public hidebysig instance void Undo() cil managed

summary.span: 将用户上下文恢复为该对象表示的 Windows 用户。

span.span: Reverts the user context to the Windows user represented by this object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例显示了如何模拟 Windows 标识使用指定的用户令牌。The following example shows how to impersonate a Windows identity using a specified user token. [!code-cpp[Classic WindowsImpersonationContext.Undo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic WindowsImpersonationContext.Undo Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WindowsImpersonationContext.Undo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic WindowsImpersonationContext.Undo Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WindowsImpersonationContext.Undo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic WindowsImpersonationContext.Undo Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 尝试将该方法用作将标识恢复为其自身之外的任何其他目的。

span.span: An attempt is made to use this method for any purpose other than to revert identity to self.

span.para: Microsoft Windows 98 和 Windows Millennium Edition 平台没有用户或用户令牌，因为模拟不会在这些平台上的发生。
Because Microsoft Windows 98 and Windows Millennium Edition platforms do not have users or user tokens, impersonation cannot take place on those platforms.
